title: When Kids Could Play Outside
description: Tom, a forty-year-old man lies dying in a forest but as he takes his final breath, gets re-born in the 1970's as an eight-year-old boy, who is given the chance to re-live his life.This true and controversial account of a young boy's journey through his formative years transports you back to a time when playing outside in the South Wales Valley had few rules or restriction and was an education in its own right.When kids could play outside is written about an era full of fun, freedom, pranks, competitiveness, danger and discovery.This is a must read for anyone who was lucky enough to have grown up in the 1970's and discovered who you were without the help of today's technology.
author: Tom    Evans
